Text: Oñ i lewatʼo̩do̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ku Darius jʼonu, o̩jo̩ e̩ke̩le̩ ochu e̩ke̩la-wñ, owñ chʼochu Chisle̩f, o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Ze̩karaya.
E̩gbale̩ abo Be̩te̩l fu She̩re̩ze̩r kpai Rige̩m-me̩le̩k kpai abo-ma kpe̩ wa ku ma chʼologu bo̩ Jihofa,
ku ma laño̩ kʼo̩la ñw amatama ku ma jʼef unyi Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du, kpai amakache̩-wñ, kakini, Naraku ochu e̩ke̩lu kʼu ño̩ fʼo̩la-mi date̩ ojoji, alu kʼu te̩tache o̩do̩ wewe-i?
Tak o̩la Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du wʼugbo mi kakini,
E̩ nako̩la ñw amone̩ ane̩-i du, kpai amatama kakini, E̩gba ku me̩ jialu ku me̩ la daido̩ ochu e̩ke̩lu kpai ochu e̩kebie o̩do̩ e̩te̩gwa-i, omi me̩ jialu ñw u? E-mi dʼef uwñ ree?
E̩gba ku me̩ la aje̩ e̩wñ ku me̩ la añmo̩, i chʼo̩la-me̩ me̩ je̩ e̩wñ ñw u n? I chʼo̩la-me̩ me̩ ñmo̩ ñw u n?

I chʼo̩la ki Jihofa kwa aka ñwu me̩ lʼalu amakache̩ o̩gbo̩gba e̩gba kʼone̩ dodo Je̩rusale̩m ki la ra ñw u kʼadogbe adogbe-wñ lʼo daka-i de̩ n? Kʼone̩ ño̩ dodo o̩wo̩ o̩pata o̩gane̩ kpai ane̩ o̩go̩ le̩ n?
Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Ze̩karaya kakini,
Abu ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka le̩ de̩ kakini, Me̩ ki nʼochochi kpʼoji ajo̩, e̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ne̩ ki chʼufe̩denyo kpʼo̩maye-wñ kʼi ño̩ liʼi ejumomi,
kʼi la tʼo̩yaukuo̩ko̩ abe̩k e̩ne̩ ki ma nʼata n, abe̩k ilowa abe̩k e̩no̩bata mane̩ n; e̩ne̩ du ef ume̩ ki ñwa ibe e̩bie̩ne̩ nyʼo̩maye-wñ ef e̩do̩-wñ n.
Ma muda ko̩ enetirʼu, ma gbikanyi, oñ ma fʼeti chʼo̩hialigbo̩, kʼama ki we egbo̩.

Ochochi ma fʼe̩do̩-ma che ki gbiti dab okuta omu, tode̩gba ku ma gbo̩ uko̩-o̩la kpʼo̩la ki Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du kpuche̩ wa lugbo Afu-wñ lʼalu amakache̩ o̩gbo̩gba le̩; todule̩ oñ e̩do̩fulu inaina kwʼugbo Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du wa.
Abe̩-le̩ i lewa tu kakini, Abu kʼi kwado̩ ma ku ma ko̩ egbo̩, alu le̩ ama akwa tak omi ako̩ egbo̩, Jihofa ki nʼe̩wñ du ka-i;

u muda anʼofutu fʼuma kpatuka rʼabo uche̩ichi du e-kʼama ma ma ma mama ta n. Abe̩le̩ ane̩ le̩ mud e̩wñ akpokpo te̩ ubi-ma, gbogbo tak e̩ne̩ du ma ño̩ lale gu ef uwñ du ge̩ n, e̩ne̩ du la dabi tʼo̩mo̩ n: todu ma mʼane̩ ku ma ñeju-wñ le̩ du che e̩wñ akpokpo te̩ ofofo.
